sentence.Network_en: Cracks will occur in the region of the thyroid cartilage because of deglutition.
sentence.Network_cn: 甲状软骨部分会由于吞咽动作而龟裂.

sentence.Network_en: Function of chewing, deglutition, respiration and speech was restored well.
sentence.Network_cn: 患者咀嚼 、 吞咽 、 呼吸、语言功能恢复良好.

sentence.Network_en: Swallowing ( or deglutition ): Act that moves food from the mouth to the stomach.
sentence.Network_cn: 吞咽: 将食物由口移到胃里的运动.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语单词的奥秘 - luozhong10的日志 - 网易博客 ... gut（ 内脏，胆量）； deglutition（ 吞咽）； gorge（ 咽喉，塞饱）；.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from French déglutition or modern Latin deglutitio(n-), from deglutire 'swallow down'

sentences.sentence: "one swallow of the liquid was enough"
"he took a drink of his beer and smacked his lips"
